articles.description: New information released last week which showed the South West's R-rate hanging at 1 - higher than that and it the number of cases goes up exponentially. The region now has the second highest rate ofcoronavirustransmission in the UK.
articles.content:
The increased infection rate of coronavirus in the South West and England is "to be expected" as lockdown rules are gradually eased, Gloucestershire's public health chief has said.
Sarah Scott, the … [+2542 chars]
